net.hockeyapp.android.tasks

Class DownloadFileTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.os.AsyncTask<Void,Integer,Long>
      • net.hockeyapp.android.tasks.DownloadFileTask
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GetFileSizeTask

    public class DownloadFileTask
extends android.os.AsyncTask<Void,Integer,Long>

    Description

    Internal helper class. Downloads an .apk from HockeyApp and stores it on external storage. If the download was successful, the file is then opened to trigger the installation.

      • createConnection

        protected URLConnection createConnection(URL url,
                                         int remainingRedirects)
                                  throws IOException
        Recursive method for resolving redirects. Resolves at most MAX_REDIRECTS times.
        Parameters:
        url - a URL
        remainingRedirects - loop counter
        Returns:
        instance of URLConnection
        Throws:
        IOException - if connection fails
